data.description:
An adorable gnome companion welcomes you home. It’s the beautiful garden of your dreams, ready to come to life through the mystical power that lies at your fingertips. 

Fujii is a meditative and magical journey through dreamlike landscapes filled with light and wonder. Explore colorful and magical biomes, lovingly nurture seeds, and introduce gentle critters to the verdant landscape you’ll manifest with your very own hands.

Take a breath, allow yourself to forget the troubles of the real world, and bask in this serene and uplifting experience about caring and cultivating. 

FEATURES
* Explore three organic biomes filled with magic, enchanted flowers, and beautiful plants
* Collect seeds to harvest colorful landscapes and nurture your own unique garden 
* Introduce gentle critters to your garden and solve puzzles with your adorable gnome companion by your side
* Embark on a peaceful and whimsical adventure set to a meditative soundscape composed by French artist and composer Norman Bambi

#820 b7210dc4

Fuji Update #2
==============

# What was added?

1. Save Slots

	- A tree will appear in main menu. At the base of the tree are three fruit representing each save slot.
	- Place the proper fruit into the tree to change which profile you are playing on. 
	- The number of leaves on the fruit represent the profile, and the insides of the fruit contain figurines that represent your progress.
	- Plant a the desired profile fruit in the New Game pot nearby to start a fresh game on that profile.

2. Free Locomotion

	- Oculus: Press Thumbstick in and hold Trigger to toggle smooth locomotion.

3. Minor Changes
	
	- Added music to the main menu.
	- Fixed incorrect lighting profile for main menu.
